version_description: FIXED: Program Crash, Play Video while Language is English.

Easier Video Player Setting
-> Tap Video Screen.
- Play Speed
- Subtitle Show/Hide
- Subtitle Font Size
- Subtitle Position Y

Bug fixes.
- Tag Listing.

Do you have any problem?
Contact us: scienartbb@gmail.com
(Or About -> Send Feedback menu)
Bug fixes.

Video Player
- User Interface Update.

Bug Fixes.
Various Enhancements.

Minor bug fixes

New App Icon.

Compatibility for iOS 10

New App Icon.

Improved UI Structure
- Overall Design
- Left Side Menu

Records
- You can determine which words were difficult to hear on Dictation!
- Check how much studied

TEDICT/TEDICTisy
- Additional Play button for iPhone
- Show Video Frame
. You can turn off on Settings screen (If your device is old one)
- Play Speed
- Volume

Repeat Player
- Background Play
- You can see the script either on Lock Screen!
- Repeat Playing from Vocabulary.
. You can listen repeatedly all the sentences which you searched!

Repeat Player
- Resume from the Last Position

TEDICT, TEDICTisy
- Support Landscape mode for iPhone / iPod touch

App Icon Update
